# GET /v1/buildBetaDetails/{id}/relationships/build | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/buildBetaDetails/{id}/relationships/build ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-buildBetaDetails-_id_-relationships-build)

-  GET /v1/buildBetaDetails/{id}/relationships/build 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/buildBetaDetails/{id}/relationships/build

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-buildBetaDetails-_id_-relationships-build#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/buildBetaDetails/{id}/relationships/build
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-buildBetaDetails-_id_-relationships-build#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-buildBetaDetails-_id_-relationships-build#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[BuildBetaDetailBuildLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/buildbetadetailbuildlinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-buildBetaDetails-_id_-relationships-build#see-also)

[`List Build Beta Details`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbetadetails)Find and list build beta details for all builds.[`Read Build Beta Detail Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbetadetails-_id_)Get a specific build beta details resource.[`Read the Build Information of a Build Beta Detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbetadetails-_id_-build)Get the build information for a specific build beta details resource.
